title: Update deployed site link/app name to include “love”

requirements.text: Update the website’s displayed name to include the word “love” by changing the HTML document title in frontend/index.html to a user-facing English title that contains “love” (this is what appears as the page/tab name and commonly as the shared link preview title).

quotes: Also edit a link name with love

acceptanceCriteria: After deployment, the browser tab/page title displays the updated title containing “love”.
No other step/page copy or button labels are changed as part of this update.

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or frontend/src/components/ui.
Keep the existing multi-step flow, animations, and previously implemented content unchanged except for the requested link/app name update.
nonGoals: Changing the deployed canister URL or any IC routing.
Adding new share buttons or changing existing “Copy Link”/footer wording beyond what is necessary to change the website name/title.
